{{Description|A statue in Enkanomiya which seems to be the key to the Sentou ceremony. The coral it is holding glows with a peculiar light.}}
The '''Statue of the Vassals''' (or Statue of the Vassals of Watatsumi) is Point of Interest in the [[Three Realms Gateway Offering]] event located near the [[Dainichi Mikoshi]].

Interacting with or standing near it recuperates the [[Bokuso Box]]'s energy, offer [[Light Realm Sigil]]s for rewards, or upgrade [[Bokuso Arts]] with [[Light Realm Core]]s.
